doc.title: Blok TV Season 1
doc.plot: Nicknamed "the urban 'Entertainment Tonight,'" BlokTV is a fresh take on the celebrity news magazine, bringing a hip and sexy flavor to industry events, including parties, awards shows and red-carpet appearances. Follow the cameras as they hit up Diddy's party in Miami's South Beach, parties for Maxim and Essence magazines, the Brooklyn Hip-Hop Festival, Macy Gray's album release party, Toccara Jones's birthday bash and many more.
